original_text: No one born of a forbidden marriage nor any of their descendants may enter the assembly of the Lord, not even in the tenth generation.
korean_text: 사생자는 여호와의 총회에 들어오지 못하리니 십 대에 이르기까지도 여호와의 총회에 들어오지 못하리라

sentences.original_text: No one born of a forbidden marriage
may enter the assembly of the Lord
not even in the tenth generation
